title: [Client] Report Items Sets Bug
body: Hello.  Couldn't find a fix anywhere, so I thought maybe the LoL community could give me answers.  My custom items set page stopp ed working.  I can't drag items into the appropriate slots.  When I click and hold, it follow the mouse, but I can't actually drop it in the item set.  It just yo-yos back to its original position as soon as I release the mouse button.  I reinstalled the whole game yesterday, and it doesn't seem to have helped, since I am still raging against my computer.  If anybody has found a fix, even a temporary one, I'd like to know about it...  Thanks a lot!

replies.body: That sounds like a strange issue and I'd like to help!  Are you on a Mac or PC?  What happens if you swap your mouse?  Are you using any third party programs that interact with league?  Let me know!

Thanks for the assist.  I play on a mac. I tried using my track pad, and my external mouse, and it does the same thing.  I don't believe any third party program can interact with it.  I even take the time to close all running programs before I actually play the game.  I found a kind of fix on the internet, where they recommended that I try moving icons on my desktop, and press esc to clear the problem, but that doesn't seem to be working for me, and I really don't see how it could've been any help to anyone, considering there is no real change done.  I,ve tried everything I could think of, and when I opened my league today, found the same problem was still keeping me from updating my item sets...  I really hope you can help, but if you can't, thanks anyways for taking interest.
Oh, and I have also tried the hextech repair tool without success...

Thanks for getting back to me.  There's actually an issue right now with the Sierra OS that's preventing Item lists from being used.  We outlined it in our current [pinned thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra), that recommends editing item lets through another PC/Operating system as a workaround.  I don't have any eta or information to provide beyond that, but I hope the workaround can help!
Ok.  Well thanks for the workaround.  I really hope there's a fix soon though, cause this is majorly inconvenient for me...
